column1: '''''Carandaith'' Vol.2, No.1''' is an issue of the magazine ''Carandaith'', published by the Australian Tolkien Society. A letter from [[Joy Hill]] (of [[Allen and Unwin
column2: George Allen & Unwin]]) includes an extract from  [[Letter to Joy Hill (June 1969)
column3: a letter sent by Tolkien]] discussing a film adaption of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (cf. p. 67).<ref>{{webcite
